name: Free Kick - Euro 2016 Edition France
description:
Conquer the Europe championship in France! Now you can do it actually, winning the online rankings tournament.

Bright and colorful free kick game for those who are looking for the best 3D football game.
Rules are clear: Choose your favorite football team, score beautiful goals with free kicks. Score more points, watch online rating of your team growing up!
Every scored free-kick adds points to your team rating and decreases the rating of your opponent.
Also you can share your most beautiful results with your FB friends. And compete with them online as well.

The game has three basic modes:
- "Championship" - National teams online rating . Score points for your team and take away points from the rival teams.
- "Arcade" - Participate in the Gamecenter rankings. Score free kicks and penalty shots, score points, and compete with other players and friends.
- "Training" - a chance to hone your skills without risking positions in the rankings.

Invite your friends - the more players will play, the more chances to your national team to win the UEFA European Championship.
The game is totally free-to-win, though you can make your way to success more comfortable with useful in-app purchases.


Good luck and we hope you enjoy our game.
